title: Where are the Sound/Music Files for champion select?
body: I've looked in nearly every file in the League of Legends folder and I can't pin point the location of the audio files for champion select. Some one please tell me where this is located! It's driving me insane not being able to find them!!

replies.body: If you're looking for links to the sound files for things like champion voice lines, you can find pretty much all of them on [**this wiki page**](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Category:Champion_audio).
No i'm looking for the champion select music. For all 3 game modes + the rotating one. I can't find that folder anywhere. Help appreciated
Ahhhhh my bad! I did some searching to figure out exactly where those files are stored. As it turns out, those are tucked away in a master assets file, which is basically untouchable.
